title: Silicone Spatula in Red
description: Bakers will save every sweet drop of delicious batters and sauces with the Cake Boss Novelty Tools 11-1/2 in. "Mix It Up" Silicone Scraping Spatula. The flexible, rubberized head of this colorful spatula features the phrase "Mix It Up" in hip lettering to bring more fun and pleasure to baking. It’s easy on nonstick surfaces and pliable enough to get into nooks and crannies. The spatula helps scrape every ounce of buttercream frosting, caramel sauce and raspberry syrup out of bowls and pans. Designed with traditional beechwood loved by professional bakers, the handle resists heat, color and flavor absorption. Heat-safe to 450°F, the spatula works great for stirring chocolate in a double boiler. Hand washing is recommended to preserve the handle’s finish. This fun scraping spatula also works well with many other items in the Cake Boss collections and makes a great gift. Scrape every last bit of delicious batters, sauces and dough out of mixing bowls and pans using the Cake Boss Novelty Tools 11-1/2 in. "Mix It Up" Silicone Scraping Spatula.Head of this colorful, sturdy silicone scraping spatula features the phrase "Mix It Up" in retro-cool letteringFlexible, rubberized head is easy on nonstick surfaces and pliable enough to get into nooks and cranniesCrafted with traditional beechwood loved by professional bakers, the handle resists heat, color and flavor absorptionHand washing is recommended to preserve the handle’s finishHeat safe to 450°F
